SA20asmahsuu:3750: vetti ca tadyathāvaditi duḥkhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ tasya ca duḥkhasya parivarjane 'bhyupāyaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:3752: etena jānannapi saṃsāraduḥkhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ tatparityāgopāyaṃ ca na khedamāpadyate bodhisattvaḥ karuṇāviśeṣāditi pradarśayati /
SA20asmahsuu:3754: Msa_17.34 kṛpā prakṛtyā pratisaṃkhyayā ca pūrvaṃ tadabhyāsavidhānayogāt /

SA20asmahsuu:3761: vairāgyato nānupalambhato vā na bodhisattvo hyakṛpastathā yaḥ //
SA20asmahsuu:3762: tatra samā sukhitādiṣu yatkiṃcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti viditvā /
SA20asmahsuu:3778: Msa_17.37 mūlaṃ karuṇā na bhaved duṣkaracaryāsahiṣṇutā na bhavet /
SA20asmahsuu:3780: Msa_17.38 cintāvihīnabuddhiḥ praṇidhānaṃ śuklajanmasu na kuryāt /
SA20asmahsuu:3783: Msa_17.39 karuṇāseko maitrī tadduḥkhe saukhyato vipulapuṣṭiḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:3791: tataśca karuṇodbhava[karuṇāto yad]duḥkhamutpadyate bodhisattvasyasvā[sattvā]rthaprayuktasya tatra saukhyotpādādvipulapuṣṭiḥ kṣāntipuṣṭirityarthaḥ /

SA20asmahsuu:3805: Msa_17.42 āviṣṭānāṃ kṛpayā na tiṣṭhati manaḥ śame kṛpālūnāṃ /

SA20asmahsuu:3809: bodhisattvānāṃ tu karuṇāviṣṭatvānnirvāṇe 'pi mano na pratiṣṭhitaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:3812: Msa_17.43 sneho na vidyate 'sau yo niravadyo na laukiko yaśca /
SA20asmahsuu:3819: Msa_17.44 duḥkhājñānamahaughe mahāndhakāre ca niśritaṃ lokaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:3820: uddhartuṃ ya upāyaḥ kathamiva na syātsa niravadyaḥ //
SA20asmahsuu:3821: duḥkhamahaugha ajñānamahāndhakāre ceti yojyaṃ / śeṣaṃ gatārthaṃ / kathaṃ lokātikrānta ityāha /
SA20asmahsuu:3822: Msa_17.45 sneho na so 'tsyarihatāṃ loke pratyekabodhibuddhānāṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:3823: prāgeva tadanyeṣāṃ kathamiva lokottaro na syāt //
SA20asmahsuu:3826: Msa_17.46 duḥkhābhāve duḥkhaṃ yatkṛpayā bhavati bodhisattvānāṃ /

SA20asmahsuu:3832: Msa_17.47 kimataḥ paramāścaryaṃ yad duḥkhaṃ saukhyamabhibhavati sarvaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:3833: kṛpayā janitaṃ laukyaṃ yena vimukto api kṛtārthaḥ //
SA20asmahsuu:3835: nāsyata āścaryataraṃ yad duḥkhameva karuṇājanitaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathā sukhaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsuu:3837: yena sukhena vimuktā arhanto 'pi kṛtārthāḥ prāgevānye /
SA20asmahsuu:3839: Msa_17.48 kṛpayā sahitaṃ dānaṃ yaddānasukhaṃ karoti dhīrāṇāṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:3841: yacca traidhātukaṃ sukhamupabhogai kṛtaṃ na tatsukhaṃ tasya sukhasya kalāṃ spṛśatītyayamuttarārdhasyārthaḥ / śeṣaṃ gatārtham /
SA20asmahsuu:3843: Msa_17.49 duḥkhamayaṃ saṃsāraṃ yatkṛpayā na tyajati sattvārthaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:3845: sarvaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ saṃsāraduḥkhe 'ntarbhūtaṃ / tasyābhyupagamāt sarvaṃ duḥkhamabhyupagataṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsuu:3847: Msa_17.50 karūṇā dānaṃ bhogāḥ sadā kṛpālorvivuddhimupayānti /
SA20asmahsuu:3858: Msa_17.51 vardhe ca vardhayāmi ca dāne paripācayāmi sukhayāmi /
SA20asmahsuu:3869: Msa_17.52 duḥkhe duḥkhī kṛpayā sukhānyanādhāya kena sukhitaḥ syāt /
SA20asmahsuu:3871: karuṇayā bodhisattvaḥ paraduḥkhairduḥkhitaḥ sattveṣvanādhāya sukhaṃ kathaṃ sukhitaḥ syāt /
SA20asmahsuu:3872: tasmātpareṣu sukhamādhāya bodhisatva ātmānameva sukhayatīti veditavyam /

SA20asmahsuu:3877: na hi kāruṇikasya vinā parasukhenāsti sukhaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:3878: tasyāyutasaukhyatvādvaudhisattvastena vinā[tma?]no dānasya phalaṃ sukhaṃ necchati /
SA20asmahsuu:3879: Msa_17.54 saphalaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ tanme sattveṣu tatsukhasukhena /
SA20asmahsuu:3880: phala teṣveva nikāmaṃ yadi me kartavyatā te 'sti //
SA20asmahsuu:3881: dānaṃ dadatā dānaṃ ca dānaphalaṃ ca tanmayā sattveṣu dattaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:3886: na hi tatsukhaṃ mataṃ me dāne pāraṃparo 'smi yataḥ //
SA20asmahsuu:3890: na hi tatsukhaṃ mataṃ me yad bhogāstathopatiṣṭhante /
SA20asmahsuu:3892: Msa_17.56 sarvāstiparityāge yatkṛpayā māṃ nirīkṣase satataṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:3893: nanu te tena jñeyaṃ na matphalenārthitāsyeti //
SA20asmahsuu:3894: yo 'haṃ dānaphalaṃ sarvameva karuṇayā nityaṃ parityajāmi nanvata eva veditavyaṃ nāsti me dānaphalenārthitvamiti bodhisattvo dānaṃ samanuśāsti /
SA20asmahsuu:3895: dānābhirato na syāṃ prāptaṃ cettatphalaṃ na visṛjeyaṃ /

SA20asmahsuu:3899: akṛtaṃ na phalasi yasmātpratikārāpekṣayā na me tulyaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:3900: yastvā karoti tasya tvaṃ phalasi / tasmāttvaṃ pratikārapekṣayā na mattulyam /
SA20asmahsuu:3902: Msa_17.58 pratikāranirvyapekṣaḥ paratra phalado 'sya kāmaṃ te //
SA20asmahsuu:3907: niravadyaṃ śuddhapadaṃ hitāvahaṃ caiva sānurakṣaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsuu:3914: nirmṛgyamayācamāne 'pyarthitvaṃ vighātaṃ vāvagamya svayameva dānāt dakṣiṇīyāparimārgaṇācca /
SA20asmahsuu:3916: Msa_17.60 sakalaṃ vipulaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ satataṃ muditaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ śuddhaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:3928: Msa_17.61 na tathopabhogatuṣṭiṃ labhate bhogī yathā parityāgāt /

SA20asmahsuu:3975: Msa_18.1 lajjā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena /

SA20asmahsuu:3987: Msa_18.2 ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ niṣevaṇālasyato bhavati lajjā /

SA20asmahsuu:4023: saṃbhārāṃśca sa bodheḥ kṣipraṃ pūrayati lajjayā dhīmān /
SA20asmahsuu:4025: Msa_18.9 sattvānāṃ pācanayā na khidyate caiva jinaputraḥ //
SA20asmahsuu:4028: ityete visaṃyoganiṣpandaphale / yaduta vipakṣarahitatvaṃ pratipakṣārahitatvaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsuu:4030: iti yathoktadoṣābhāvaṃ guṇayogaṃ ca prāpnotīti saṃdarśitam /
SA20asmahsuu:4031: Msa_18.11 doṣamalino hi bālo hīvirahātsuvasanaiḥ sugupto 'pi /
SA20asmahsuu:4036: ākāśamiva na lipto hrīyukto jinasuto bhavati dharmaiḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4043: Msa_18.13 ārakṣā cāpi hrīḥ saṃsaratāṃ sarvadoṣebhyaḥ //
SA20asmahsuu:4051: etena caturvidhaṃ hrīkṛtaṃ liṅgaṃ hīmato darśayati /
SA20asmahsuu:4060: Msa_18.17 vīryaṃ samādhiḥ prajñā ca sattvaṃ dhairyaṃ dhṛtirmatā /
SA20asmahsuu:4068: sarvakāryeṣu hi līnacittatayā vā bhayamutpadyate tadanutsāhataḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4073: Msa_18.19 prakṛtyā praṇidhāne ca nirapekṣatva eva ca /
SA20asmahsuu:4078: Msa_18.21 niḥsaṃkleśe ca tatraiva dhṛtirdhīrasya jāyate /
SA20asmahsuu:4079: asamā ca tadanyebhyaḥ so 'gre dhṛtimatāṃ yataḥ[mataḥ] //
SA20asmahsuu:4102: ābhyāṃ vastuto niśrayataḥ svabhāvataḥ prabhedataścākhedo nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4108: tābhyāṃ hi khedotpattito lajjayate na cotpādayati /

SA20asmahsuu:4142: Msa_18.27 kāyena vacasā caiva satyajñānena cāsamā /

SA20asmahsuu:4145: Msa_18.28 sā punaḥ kimarthamityāha / sattvānāṃ bhājanatvāya /
SA20asmahsuu:4150: dvābhyāṃ satyābhyāṃ lokasyodayaḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāro yaścodayo yena ceti kṛtvā /
SA20asmahsuu:4155: Msa_18.30 śamāya prāptaye teṣāṃ dhīmān satyeṣu yujyate /
SA20asmahsuu:4164: tatra prāmāṇiko 'rtho yaḥ pramāṇabhūtena nīto vibhaktaḥ śāstrā vā tatpramāṇīkṛtena vā /
SA20asmahsuu:4169: prathame pratisaraṇe ārṣadharmapratikṣeptuḥ pudnalasya pratiṣedho deśitaḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4182: paryāye lakṣaṇe vākye jñāne jñānācca tā matāḥ //
SA20asmahsuu:4185: tṛtīyā vākye pratyekaṃ janapadeṣu yā bhāṣāḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4188: Msa_18.35 deśanāyāṃ prayuktasya yasya yena ca deśanā /
SA20asmahsuu:4194: deśanāyāṃ hi prayuktasya yasya ca deśanā yena ca /
SA20asmahsuu:4201: vākyena deśanā tayoreva dvayoḥ sarvathā prāpaṇāt /
SA20asmahsuu:4203: ato yacca yena ca deśyate tajjñānāt catasraḥ pratisaṃvido vyavasthāpitāḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4206: etena pratisaṃvidāṃ nirvacanaṃ karma ca darśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:4207: pratyātmaṃ lokottareṇa jñānena sarvadharmasamatāṃ tathatāmavetya uttarakālaṃ tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena jñānena pravedanā paryāyādīnāṃ pratisaṃviditi nirvacanaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:4216: Msa_18.39 dānaṃ śīlaṃ ca puṇyasya prajñā jñānasya saṃbhṛtiḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4221: punaḥ prajñāyāṃ pariṇāmanātsarvāḥ pañca pāramitā jñānasaṃbhāro veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4222: Msa_18.40 saṃtatyā bhāvanāmetya bhūyo bhūyaḥ śubhasya hi /
SA20asmahsuu:4223: āhāro yaḥ sa saṃbhāro vī[dhī]re sarvārthasādhakaḥ //
SA20asmahsuu:4256: kathaṃ prāptitaḥ kāyādīnāṃ na visaṃyogāya nāvisaṃyogāya /
SA20asmahsuu:4267: kathaṃ bhāvanātaḥ [MSA_Bagchi_136] atyantaṃ tadbhāvanāt nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇe 'pi tadakṣayāt /
SA20asmahsuu:4273: yāvatyaḥ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanā uktāḥ tadvipakṣāṇāṃ doṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa samyakprahāṇabhāvaneti samastaṃ samyakprahāṇalakṣaṇam / prabhedena punaḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4274: Msa_18.46 saṃsārasyopabhoge ca tyāge nivaraṇasya ca /

SA20asmahsuu:4276: Msa_18.47 animittavihāre ca labdhau vyākaraṇasya ca /
SA20asmahsuu:4277: sattvānāṃ paripāke ca abhiṣeke ca dhīmatāṃ //
SA20asmahsuu:4278: Msa_18.48 kṣetrasya ca viśuddhyarthaṃ niṣṭhāgamana eva ca /
SA20asmahsuu:4292: ye ca vipakṣāsteṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa samyakprahāṇabhāvanā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsuu:4294: Msa_18.49 chandaṃ niśritya yogasya bhāvanā sanimittikā /

SA20asmahsuu:4315: sarvārthasiddhirlaukikī lokottarā ca veditavyā / śeṣaṃ gatārtham /
SA20asmahsuu:4327: aṣṭānāṃ prahāṇasaṃskārāṇāṃ chando vyāyāmaḥ śraddhā vyāvasāyikaḥ upāyaḥ /

SA20asmahsuu:4534: evaśabdenāvadhāraṇaṃ parikalpita ātmā nāsti parikalpamātraṃ tvastīti parikalpitalakṣaṇasyābhāvārtho 'nātmārtha ityuktaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsuu:4542: tatra kṣaṇikaṃ sarvaṃ saṃskṛtamiti paścādvacanadiyaṃ pratijñā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsuu:4547: atha kālāntaraṃ sthitvā pūrvottaranirodhotpādataḥ prabandheneṣyate vṛttiḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4549: naiva cotpannasya vinā prabandhena kālāntaraṃ bhāvo yujyate /
SA20asmahsuu:4552: tadyadi bhūtvā punaruttarakālaṃ bhavati tasyāvaśyaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:4554: na ca tattenaiva hetunā bhavitumarhati tasyopayu[bhu]ktahetukatvāt /
SA20asmahsuu:4557: evaṃ vinā prabandhenotpannasya kālāntaraṃ bhāvo na yujyate /
SA20asmahsuu:4558: athāpyevamiṣyeta notpannaṃ punarutpadyate yadarthaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ syādutpannaṃ tu kālāntareṇa paścānnirudhyate notpannamātrameveti /
SA20asmahsuu:4569: māyopamāste bhikṣo saṃskārā āpāyikāstāvatkālikā itvarapratyupasthāyina iti /
SA20asmahsuu:4571: te hi saṃskārāṇāmudayavyayau manasikurvantaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ teṣāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyanti /
SA20asmahsuu:4572: anyathā hi teṣāmapi nirvidvirāgavimuktayo na syuryathānyeṣāṃ maraṇakālādiṣu nirodhaṃ paśyatāṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:4573: yadi cotpannaḥ saṃskāraḥ kālāntaraṃ tiṣṭhet sa svayameva vā tiṣṭhetsvayameva sthātuṃ samarthaḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4578: kena vā so 'nte punaḥ sthātuṃ na samarthaḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4582: labdhe tu vināśakāraṇe paścādvinaśyati agnimeva śyāmateti /
SA20asmahsuu:4587: tathā hi tatsaṃbandhāt śyāmatāyāḥ saṃtatirvisadṛśī gṛhyate na tu sarvathaivāpravṛttiḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4595: athāpi syātpratikṣaṇamapūrvotpattau tadevedamiti pratyabhijñānaṃ na syāditi /
SA20asmahsuu:4603: tadyadi nādita evārabdhaṃ bhavedādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhāvānāmante pariṇāmo nopalabhyeta /
SA20asmahsuu:4604: tasmādādita evānyathātvamārabdhaṃ yatkrameṇābhivardhamānamante vyaktimāpadyate kṣīrasyeva dadyavasthāyāṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:4613: kṣaṇikaṃ hi cittaṃ prasiddhaṃ tasya cānye saṃskārāścakṣurūpādayo hetutaḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4615: na tvakṣaṇikāt kṣaṇikaṃ bhavitumarhati yathā nityādanityamiti /
SA20asmahsuu:4619: cittena hi sarve saṃskārāścakṣurādayaḥ sādhiṣṭhānā upāttāḥ sahasaṃmurchanāḥ tadanugrahānuvṛttitaḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4623: cittenāyaṃ loko nīyate cittena parikṛṣyate cittasyotpannasyotpannasya vaśe vartate iti /
SA20asmahsuu:4627: śuddhaṃ hi yogināṃ cittaṃ saṃskārā anuvartante /
SA20asmahsuu:4629: dhyāyī bhikṣuḥ ṛddhimāṃścittavaśe prāpta imaṃ dāruskandhaṃ sacet suvarṇamadhimucyate tadapyasya tathaiva [MSA_Bagchi_145] syāditi /
SA20asmahsuu:4632: tathā hi pāpakāriṣu sattveṣu bāhyā bhāvā hīnā bhavanti /
SA20asmahsuu:4636: na hi kṣaṇikasyākṣaṇikaṃ phalaṃ yujyate tadanuvidhāyitvāt /
SA20asmahsuu:4637: evaṃ tāvadaviśeṣeṇa saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ sādhitam /
SA20asmahsuu:4638: ādhyātmikānāṃ punaḥ sādhanārthaṃ pañca ślokā veditavyāḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4658: hīnatvena viśiṣṭatvena ca yo durgatau [sugatau?] cotpadyamānānāṃ yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:4659: bhāsvaratvena yo nirmitakāmeṣu paranirmitakāmeṣu rūpārūpyeṣu copapannānāṃ cittamātrādhīnatvāt /
SA20asmahsuu:4664: pratibimbatvena yo aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyināṃ samādhivaśena pratibimbānāṃ[khyānāṃ] saṃskārāṇāmutpādaḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4665: etasyāṃ caturdaśavidhāyāmutpattāvādhyātmikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ hetumānaviśeṣādibhiḥ kāraṇairveditavyam /
SA20asmahsuu:4667: yadi hi tasya hetutvena viśeṣo na syāt taduttarāyāḥ saṃskārapravṛtteruttarottaraviśeṣo [MSA_Bagchi_146] nopalabhyeta hetvaviśeṣāt /
SA20asmahsuu:4671: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinānyatvena parimāṇaviśeṣo bhavet /
SA20asmahsuu:4676: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā puṣṭatarotpattyā yujyetopacayaḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4678: na hi tiṣṭhatyāśraye ca tadāśritasyānavasthānaṃ yujyate /
SA20asmahsuu:4679: yāne tiṣṭhati tadārūḍhānavasthānavadanyathā hyāśrayatvaṃ na saṃbhavet /
SA20asmahsuu:4683: na cāvasthāntareṣu paripāka ādāvavināśe satyante vikārābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsuu:4684: tathā hīnaviśiṣṭotpattau kṣaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā vikāraparipākotpattau /
SA20asmahsuu:4685: na hi tathāsthiteṣveva saṃskāreṣu karmavāsanā vṛttiṃ labhate yato durgatau vā syādutpattiḥ sugatau vā /
SA20asmahsuu:4691: na hi saṃskārāṇāṃ deśāntarasaṃkrāntilakṣaṇā gatirnāma kācit kriyā yujyate /
SA20asmahsuu:4692: sā hyutpannā vā saṃskāraṃ deśāntaraṃ gamayedanutpannā vā /
SA20asmahsuu:4693: yadyutpannā tena gatikāle na kaṃcidgata iti sthitasyaiva gamanaṃ nopapadyate /
SA20asmahsuu:4694: athānutpannā tenāsatyāṃ gatau gata iti na yujyate /
SA20asmahsuu:4695: sā ca kriyā yadi taddeśastha eva saṃskāre kāritraṃ karoti na yujyate /
SA20asmahsuu:4699: na ca kriyā tatra vā anyatra vā deśe sthitā saṃskārādanyopalabhyate /
SA20asmahsuu:4708: asti svabhāvavaśena yathā vāyostiryaggamanamagnerūrdhvaṃ jvalanamapāṃ nimne syandanaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:4713: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ hetubhāvamantareṇa tathāsthitasyānyasminkāle punarbījabhāvo yujyate /
SA20asmahsuu:4715: na ca śakyaṃ [MSA_Bagchi_147] pūrvaṃ sabījatvaṃ carame kṣaṇe nirbījatvamabhyupagantuṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:4732: ato bhūtānāṃ ṣaḍivadhārthasya ca kṣaṇikatvaṃ vidhīyate /
SA20asmahsuu:4742: adbhyo hi vāyusahitābhyaḥ pṛthivī saṃbhūtā vivartakāle /
SA20asmahsuu:4749: sa cāntareṇa pratikṣaṇamanyotpattiṃ na yujyate vināśakāraṇābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsuu:4752: na hi tejasyutpanne tejaḥ sahotpannamindhanaṃ tathaivāvatiṣṭhate /
SA20asmahsuu:4753: na ca dagdhendhanaṃ tejaḥ sthātuṃ samarthaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:4756: śabdaḥ punaryo 'pi kālāntaramupalabhyate ghaṇṭādīnāṃ tasyāpi kṣaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ tāratamyopalabdheḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4758: dharmāyatanikasyāpi rūpasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasiddhameva cittānuvṛtteryathā pūrvamuktaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:4760: pṛcchrayate khalvapi sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ sidhyati [MSA_Bagchi_148] kathaṃ kṛtvā /
SA20asmahsuu:4763: yadyevaṃ vadet pratikṣaṇamanya[nitya]tvasyāgrahaṇāditi sa idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4770: dvividhaṃ hi vailakṣaṇyaṃ svabhāvavailakṣaṇyaṃ vṛttivailakṣaṇyaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsuu:4771: tadyadi tāvat svabhāvavailakṣaṇyamabhipretamata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ yujyate /
SA20asmahsuu:4772: na hi tatsvabhāva eva tasya dṛṣṭānto bhavati yathā pradīpaḥ pradīpasya gaurvā goriti /
SA20asmahsuu:4773: atha vṛttivailakṣaṇyamata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ pradīpādīnāṃ prasiddhatvāt /
SA20asmahsuu:4778: cakṣurādiṣu tiṣṭhatsu tadāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ prabandhena gacchatīti na yujyate /
SA20asmahsuu:4779: yadyevaṃ vadet nanu ca dṛṣṭaṃ vartisaṃniśrite pradīpe prabandhena gacchati vartyā avasthānamiti /
SA20asmahsuu:4781: na dṛṣṭaṃ tatprabandhena vartyāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ vikārotpatteriti /
SA20asmahsuu:4782: yadyevaṃ vadet sati kṣaṇikattve saṃskārāṇāṃ kasmātpradīpādiva kṣaṇiakatvaṃ na siddhamiti /
SA20asmahsuu:4786: itarathā hi anityanityaviparyāso na syāttadabhāve saṃkleśo na syāt kutaḥ punarvyavadānamityevaṃ paryanuyogato 'pi kṣaṇikatvaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prasiddhaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:4788: Msa_18.92 prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu /

SA20asmahsuu:4801: Msa_18.98 darśanādau ca tadyatnaḥ svayaṃbhūrna trayādapi /
SA20asmahsuu:4808: ātmopalambhe doṣaśca deśito yata eva ca //

SA20asmahsuu:4813: pudgala kimastīti vaktavyo nāstīti vaktavyaḥ / āha /
SA20asmahsuu:4814: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu /
SA20asmahsuu:4815: yataśca prajñaptito 'stīti vaktavyo dravyato nāstīti vaktavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4819: na hi sa dravyata upalabhyate rūpādivat /
SA20asmahsuu:4821: na ca pudgalaṃ buddhyā na pratipadyante pudgalavādinaḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4823: dṛṣṭa eva dharme ātmānamupalabhate prajñāpayatīti kathaṃ nopalabdho bhavati /
SA20asmahsuu:4824: na sa evamupalabhyamāno dravyata upalabdho bhavati /
SA20asmahsuu:4826: viparyāsāt tathā hyanātmanyātmeti viparyāsa ukto bhagavatā /
SA20asmahsuu:4830: satkāyadṛṣṭikleśalakṣaṇo hyeṣa saṃkleśo yaduta ahaṃ mameti /
SA20asmahsuu:4832: na[sa] caiṣa saṃkleśa iti kathaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:4835: yatra punarvastuni rūpādisaṃjñakeprajñaptiḥ pudgala iti tasmātkimekatvena pudgalo vaktavya āhosvidanyetvena / āha /
SA20asmahsuu:4840: ekatve hi skandhānāmātmatvaṃ prasajyate pudgalasya ca dravyasattvaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:4844: ye punaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanamatikramya pudgalasya dravyato 'stitvamicchanti ta idaṃ syurvacanīyāḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4853: ekatvenānyatvena ca agnirhi nāma tejodhāturindhanaṃ śeṣāṇi bhūtāni /
SA20asmahsuu:4855: loke ca vināpyagninā dṛṣṭamindhanaṃ kāṣṭhādi vināpi cendhanenāgniriti siddhamanyatvaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:4858: upalabdhestathā hi vāyunā vikṣiptaṃ dūramapi jvalatparaiti /
SA20asmahsuu:4863: astyeva pudgalo ya eṣa draṣṭā yāvadvijñātā kartā bhoktā jñātā moktā ca /
SA20asmahsuu:4866: sa hi darśānādisaṃjñakānāṃ vijñānānāṃ pratyayabhāvena vā kartā bhavet svāmitvena vā / tatra tāvat /
SA20asmahsuu:4868: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ / nairarthakyāt / na hi tasya tatra kiṃcitsāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:4870: sa hi vijñānapravṛttau svāmībhavannani[bhavanni]ṣṭaṃ vijñānamanityaṃ na pravartayet /
SA20asmahsuu:4892: api khalu pudgalo draṣṭā bhavan yāvadvijñātā darśanādiṣu saprayatno vā bhavenniṣprayatno vā /
SA20asmahsuu:4893: saprayatnasya vā punarasau prayatnaḥ svayaṃbhūrvā bhavedākasmikaḥ / tatpratyayo [vā?]
SA20asmahsuu:4897: neti vartate / niṣprayatnasya vā punaḥ sataḥ siddhaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsuu:4899: ityasati vyāpāre pudgalasya darśanādau kathamasau draṣṭā bhavati /
SA20asmahsuu:4904: yadi darśanādiṣu prayatna ākasmiko yato darśanādīni /
SA20asmahsuu:4905: na tarhi teṣāṃ pudgalaḥ karteti kathamasau draṣṭā bhavati yāvadvijñātā sati vākasmikatve nirapekṣatvāt na kadācitprayatno na syādanityo na syāt /
SA20asmahsuu:4906: nitye ca prayatne darśanādīnāṃ yugapacca nityaṃ ca pravṛttiḥ syāditi doṣaḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:4911: tasya tathā sthitasya pratyayatvaṃ na yujyate /

SA20asmahsuu:5764: na ca sadā samāhitā bhavanti na ca sarvasaṃśayāṃśchindanti /
SA20asmahsuu:5766: Msa_20.47 āśraye 'thāśrite deśye vākye jñāne ca deśike /
SA20asmahsuu:5769: atra samāsato yacca deśyate yena ca deśyate tatra nityamavyāhatamatitvena bhagavataścatasraḥ pratisaṃvido deśitāḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:5775: Msa_20.48 upetya vacanaisteṣāṃ carijña āgatau gatau /
SA20asmahsuu:5776: niḥ sāre caiva sattvānāṃ svavavāda namo 'stu te //
SA20asmahsuu:5779: teṣāṃ bhāṣayā divyaśrotrābhijñayā cittacaritraṃ jñātvā cetaḥparyāyābhijñayā yathā pūrvāntādihagatiryathā cāparānte gatiryathā ca saṃsārānniḥ saraṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:5782: Msa_20.49 satpauruṣyaṃ prapadyante tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvadehinaḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:5784: atra lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānāṃ bhagavati mahāpuruṣatvasaṃpratyayena darśanamātrātpareṣāṃ prasādajanakatvaṃ karma saṃdarśitam /
SA20asmahsuu:5788: atra bhagavataścaturvidhayā vaśitayā sarvākāraścatasraḥ pariśuddhayaḥ paridīpitāḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:5794: Msa_20.51 upāye śaraṇe śuddhau sattvānāṃ vipravādane /
SA20asmahsuu:5795: mahāyāne ca niryāṇe mārabhañja namo 'stu te //
SA20asmahsuu:5796: atra caturṣvartheṣu sattvānāṃ vipravādanāya māro yastadbhañjakatvena bhagavato daśānāṃ balānāṃ karma saṃdarśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:5815: anena trīṇyarakṣāṇi trīṇi ca smṛtyupasthānāni bhagavataḥ paridīpitāni teṣāṃ ca karma gaṇaparipakarṣakatvaṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:5816: tairhi yathākramaṃ vi[ni]gṛhyavaktā ca bhavati parṣatsu nirārakṣatvāt /
SA20asmahsuu:5820: sarvadā tava sarvajña bhūtārthika namo 'stu te //
SA20asmahsuu:5821: anena cāre vihāre vā sarvatra sarvadā vāsarvajñaceṣṭitasyābhāvāt bhagavataḥ sarvakleśavāsanāsasuddhātaḥ paridīpitaḥ /
SA20asmahsuu:5822: asarvajño hi kṣīṇakleśo 'pyasamuddhātitatvād vāsanāyā ekadā bhrāntena hastinā sārdhaṃ samāgacchati bhrāntena rathenetyevamādikamasarvajñaceṣṭitaṃ karoti /
SA20asmahsuu:5828: anena yasya sattvasya yo 'rthaḥ karaṇīyo yasminkāle tatkālānativartanāt abandhyaṃ kṛtyaṃ sadā bhagavata ityasaṃmoṣadharmatvaṃ svabhāvataḥ karmataśca saṃdarśitam /
SA20asmahsuu:5833: atra mahākaruṇā bhagavataḥ karmataḥ svabhāvataśca paridīpitā /
SA20asmahsuu:5834: mahākaruṇayā hi bhagavān ṣaṭkṛtvo rātrindivena lokaṃ pratyavekṣate ko hīyate ko vardhate ityevamādi /
SA20asmahsuu:5849: nāstyapratisaṃkhyāyopekṣeti cārasaṃgṛhītāḥ ṣaḍāveṇikā buddhadharmā ye buddhasyaiva saṃvidyante nānyeṣāṃ /
SA20asmahsuu:5858: anena tribhiśca kāyaiḥ sarvākārabodhyupagamatvāt sarvajñeyasarvākārajñānācca sarvākārajñatā bhagavataḥ paridīpitā /
SA20asmahsuu:5860: sarvajñeyasarvākārajñānaṃ punaratra sarvasattvānāṃ devamanuṣyādīnāṃ sarvasaṃśayacchedena karmaṇā nirdiṣṭam /
SA20asmahsuu:5884: nānālokadhātuṣu dṛśyamānatā nirmāṇakāyena parṣanmaṇḍaleṣvapi dṛśyamānatā sāṃbhogikena kāyena /
